document.full_text: american express co has formed a joint venture with the french luxury shopping site vente-privee.com, which will expand the lender's e-commerce business while opening the web site to american consumers.
document.title: amex in venture with french luxury shopping site
lines_and_colors: american express co has formed a joint venture with the french luxury shopping site vente-privee.com, which will expand the lender's e-commerce business while opening the web site to american consumers.
